column1: Hold an American Express Centurion Card
Gain 1 million yen per month as unearned income per month
Own a Leica to capture what I see every day
Control all my home appliance over voices
Live in a house with natural wood floor
Install amplifier and discrete player in my audio room
Play video games with a pair of tall-boy speakers
Listen to classic music in my audio room
Live in a house at upper hills
Own and drive an electric car
Register a patent under my name
Decorate walls with my pencil drawing
